title: Staycation
description: Staycation is a booking website built with MERN Stack. It includes API Route, Admin page with EJS, and frontend for web booking app.

title: Weather App - PWA
description: Weather App is an PWA app website built with ReactJS. A progressive web application (PWA) is a type of application software delivered through the web, built using common web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Tokopedia - Redesign Landing Page
description: Tokopedia is one of the top ecommerce in Indonesia. This is a raw design which I emphasize the real time trending section. The real time trending is inspired by Melon which is the top music platform in South Korea.

title: Studext
description: Studext is educational platform which combine ecommerce system with learning management system. Â It contains paid course, webinar, olympiad, and tryout.
